name: evernote
title: Evernote Instant Search
description: Search your Evernote notes instantly using the local database of the Mac official Evernote client.
author: artpi

commands.name: search-notes
commands.title: Search Notes
commands.subtitle: Search your Evernote notes
commands.description: Search your Evernote notes instantly using the local database of the Mac official Evernote client.

commands.name: search-tasks
commands.title: Search Open Tasks
commands.subtitle: Search your Evernote tasks within notes
commands.description: Search your Evernote tasks within notes instantly using the local database of the Mac official Evernote client.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
